name: prepodiumprivate
description: demo of private micro frontends with podium

scripts.startAll: (cd ./sveltepod && npm run podiumbuild) && (cd ./reactpod && npm run podiumbuild) && (cd ./htmlbuspod && npm run podiumbuild) && (cd ./vuepod && npm run podiumbuild) && (cd ./app && npm start)
scripts.installAll: (cd ./sveltepod && npm install) && (cd ./reactpod && yarn) && (cd ./htmlbuspod && npm install) && (cd ./vuepod && npm install) && (cd ./app && npm install)
scripts.updateAll: (cd ./sveltepod && npm update) && (cd ./reactpod && yarn upgrade) && (cd ./htmlbuspod && npm update) && (cd ./vuepod && npm update) && (cd ./app && npm update)

author: Jozzeh
